text:
 Metrics. List 3 or more metrics that you could use to evaluate the performance of
evaluated time series forecasting models.
 Modeling Algorithms. Pick a standard time series forecasting dataset and list 3 or
more algorithms that you could evaluate for each level in the Test Models section of the
framework.
 Framework Automation. Design a framework that could use that automates one part
or multiple parts of this process.
If you explore any of these extensions, I’d love to know.
